title: Salesforce CRM Strategy & Development Leader
snippet:
Social Garden was founded in 2013 and is a pioneer in the predictive demand generation market that utilizes emerging marketing automation technology, social and big data to scale organisational EBITA and revenue.

The business has grown from 3 founders, to a team of 35 in three years and is led by a dynamic young team of thought leaders in the growth hacking, data analytics and marketing automation sector. 

We have a strong Phillipenes based team that we have worked with for the past three years.

The Role

You will be responsible for working with our Australian based Salesforce team to build and manage our offshore CRM operations as well as drive key client strategy and development.


•	Utilise client CRM systems to identify areas to improve your client’s results
•	Mentor and support junior CRM developers and marketing automation producers
•	Work with management to develop and optimise client strategy
•	Keep project management software (Asana) up to date at all times
•	Track time against jobs with a focus on efficiency

Attributes and Abilities

•	Passionate about digital marketing and high growth companies
•	Understanding of digital marketing technology and audience segmentation
•	Self-motivated and a commitment to personal development 
•	Proactive, positive attitude and a kind spirit
•	Strong communication skills with excellent English
•	Ridiculously high attention to detail
•	Strong ability to identify and solve problems within the client’s customer journey
•	Proven ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team environment.
•	Hungry for career progression - we are growing quickly & want you to grow with us
•	Experience in real estate sector, advertising/media/technology companies (preferred)

Experience

•	3+ years working in a Salesforce strategy and implementation leadership
•	Certified Salesforce developer (preferred)
•	Certified Salesforce administrator (preferred)
•	Experience in Salesforce Administration - user management, Salesforce setup, workflow processes, formulas (for validation rules etc...)
•	Significant experience integrating Salesforce into third party applications and programs
•	Experience working with the marketing cloud - Marketo, Pardot, Exact Target 
•	Experience gathering CRM requirements, developing and executing strategy


What We Bring to the Table

•	Build something you can proud of. We are a high-growth company scaling quickly
•	BRW Fast Starters 2015 (fastest 100 growing companies in Australia)
•	Impact to business. This is a critical role and your job is key to our success. 
•	Enormous potential for success. With this job you have the full playing field to find new    opportunities within the market. 
•	You have strong executive support, mentorship and a great team to help you build and execute
•	The talent you'll meet. Our team are some of the brightest young minds in our industry and we take great pride in the amazing work we collectively deliver to our clients.
•	The team we're building. We have a great team that works hard and has a lot of fun along the way. We will continue to pack the office with passionate, exceptionally talented people that believe in our vision and embody our values.
•	Our impact. We're disrupting business models that have not changed in decades. We're building something special, and will bring a new level of talent to the Australian marketplace.
